channel.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack!?[PI]
channel.description:
This just started happening today and it's with any special attack. Here is the exception shown in the command prompt. [code][7/2/11 8:34 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1037 [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:2931) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:222) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickNPC.processPacket(C lickNPC.java:99) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1789) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:160) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:175) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1037 [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:2931) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:222) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1518)
[7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:162) [7/2/11 8:34 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:175)[/code]

item.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Dayne Dayne
item.description:
@Dayne wrote:

Same happened to me, I was using TorvaPKz base and for no reason when I speced I DCed.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:6, topic:401971”][quote author=Impious Lols link=topic=499024.msg3649264#msg3649264 date=1309613770]

public void updateSpecialBar() { if(c.usingSpecial && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 15486) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@ Special Attack ("+(int)c.specAmount*10+"%)", c.specBarId); } else { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@bla@ Special Attack ("+(int)c.specAmount*10+"%)", c.specBarId); } }
No.
EDIT: I didn’t do anything to my code, I just did an update, and it was fine after the update.
With no edits…
Wtf…?
[/quote]
So, it’s fixed now? weird…[/quote]
Any idea what would cause that…?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:5, topic:401971”]public void updateSpecialBar() { if(c.usingSpecial && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 15486) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@ Special Attack ("+(int)c.specAmount*10+"%)", c.specBarId); } else { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@bla@ Special Attack ("+(int)c.specAmount*10+"%)", c.specBarId); } }
No.
EDIT: I didn’t do anything to my code, I just did an update, and it was fine after the update.
With no edits…
Wtf…?[/quote]
So, it’s fixed now? weird…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

public void updateSpecialBar() { if(c.usingSpecial && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 15486) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@ Special Attack ("+(int)c.specAmount*10+"%)", c.specBarId); } else { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@bla@ Special Attack ("+(int)c.specAmount*10+"%)", c.specBarId); } }
No.
EDIT: I didn’t do anything to my code, I just did an update, and it was fine after the update.
With no edits…
Wtf…?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:3, topic:401971”] case 29138: if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15486) { if(c.getCombat().checkSpecAmount(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon])) { c.gfx0(1958); c.SolProtect = 120; c.startAnimation(10518); c.getItems().updateSpecialBar(); c.usingSpecial = !c.usingSpecial; c.sendMessage("All damage will be split into half for 1 minute."); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@bla@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 7562); } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have the required special energy to use this attack."); } } c.specBarId = 7586; c.usingSpecial = !c.usingSpecial; c.getItems().updateSpecialBar(); break;
Again, this just started happening today and I did nothing that would effect special attack code… [/quote]
Hmm and u did anything with the updatespecialbar method?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

case 29138: if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15486) { if(c.getCombat().checkSpecAmount(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon])) { c.gfx0(1958); c.SolProtect = 120; c.startAnimation(10518); c.getItems().updateSpecialBar(); c.usingSpecial = !c.usingSpecial; c.sendMessage("All damage will be split into half for 1 minute."); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@bla@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 7562); } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have the required special energy to use this attack."); } } c.specBarId = 7586; c.usingSpecial = !c.usingSpecial; c.getItems().updateSpecialBar(); break;
Again, this just started happening today and I did nothing that would effect special attack code…

Read full topic
